paper_abstract: In [7], Seebold (1998) announced that Sturmian words generated by morphisms are all rigid. There was a gap in the proof. This gap is corrected here to complete a combinatorial proof of this result. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Completing a combinatorial proof of the rigidity of Sturmian words generated by morphisms
